house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1963 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) . Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty
